active.title: Active MCPs
active.switch_to_store: Switch to the Store tab to configure new integrations

store.title: MCP Store
store.description: Discover and configure new MCP integrations

validation.invalid: Fix JSON errors to see preview
validation.missing_command: Missing required field: command (for stdio transport)
validation.missing_baseurl: Missing required field: baseUrl (for http/sse transport)
validation.missing_mcpservers: Missing or invalid "mcpServers" field (must be an object)
validation.invalid_transport: Server "{{serverId}}": missing or invalid "transport" or "type" field
validation.invalid_server_id: Server "{{serverId}}": ID must contain only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, and underscores
validation.invalid_disabled_transport: Disabled server "{{serverId}}": missing or invalid "transport" or "type" field

preview.title: Configuration Preview
preview.startup_note: These servers will be connected on startup

test.success_message: Connection test successful! Server is responding correctly.
test.failed_message: Connection test failed. Please check your configuration.
test.error_message: Connection test failed with an unexpected error.

automatic.title: Automatic MCP Configuration
automatic.description: AI-powered configuration from text or URL
automatic.textarea_placeholder:
Paste MCP configuration from:
• GitHub URL (e.g., https://github.com/org/mcp-server)
• Installation command (e.g., npx @org/mcp-server)
• Documentation text or README section
automatic.security_warning: ⚠️  Do not paste API keys, tokens, or passwords. AI will extract configuration only.
automatic.preview_empty: Configure a server to see preview
automatic.validation_empty_env: Please fill in the following environment variables
automatic.add_success_message: Server "{{name}}" added successfully! You can add another server or close this dialog.
automatic.no_openai_key_description: Automatic MCP extraction requires an OpenAI API key. Please configure OpenAI in Settings → Models to use this feature.

dialog.delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
dialog.delete_warning: This will remove the server from your configuration file. This action cannot be undone.

import_export.conflicts_description: The following servers will be overwritten: {{servers}}
import_export.invalid_format: Invalid configuration format: missing or invalid mcpServers
